description: Marx is a mischievous jester-like character from the Kirby series, known for his manipulative nature and trickery.  He initially appears friendly but is revealed as a villain seeking to control Planet Popstar. Despite his antagonistic role, he possesses a playful side evident in his ravenous appetite and knack for elaborate pranks.  His true form is more monstrous and intimidating, showcasing a powerful, though ultimately comedic, villain.
